/* insertSchParticipants */ INSERT INTO T_SC_SCH_USER (SCHM_SEQ, SCH_SEQ, CDE_SEQ, CDE_TYPE, SCH_PARTITION_TYPE, SCH_AUTORITY, CAL_SEQ, USE_YND, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_SEQ, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_SEQ) VALUES
( #{participants.schmSeq}, #{participants.schSeq}, #{participants.cdeSeq}, #{participants.cdeType}, '10', #{participants.schAutority}, #{participants.calSeq}, 'Y', #{participants.createDate}, #{participants.createSeq}, now(), #{participants.modifySeq} )

/* insertSchDisclosureScopes */ INSERT INTO T_SC_SCH_USER (SCHM_SEQ, SCH_SEQ, CDE_SEQ, CDE_TYPE, SCH_PARTITION_TYPE, SCH_AUTORITY, CAL_SEQ, USE_YND, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_SEQ, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_SEQ) VALUES
( #{disclosureScopes.schmSeq}, #{disclosureScopes.schSeq}, #{disclosureScopes.cdeSeq}, #{disclosureScopes.cdeType}, '20', #{disclosureScopes.schAutority}, #{disclosureScopes.calSeq}, 'Y', #{disclosureScopes.createDate}, #{disclosureScopes.createSeq}, now(), #{disclosureScopes.modifySeq} )
mapper.select: /* checkEcalExist */ SELECT IFNULL(MIN(TSC.CAL_SEQ),0) AS calSeq FROM T_SC_CAL TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_TYPE = 'E' AND TSC.CREATE_SEQ = #{cdeSeq} AND TSC.USE_YND = 'Y'
mapper.insert: /* insertEcal */ INSERT INTO T_SC_CAL (CAL_SEQ, CAL_TITLE, CAL_TYPE, USE_YND, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_SEQ) VALUES (#{currentCalValue}, '개인캘린더', 'E', 'Y', NOW(), #{cdeSeq});

/* insertEcalUser */ INSERT INTO T_SC_CAL_USER (CAL_SEQ, CDE_SEQ, CDE_TYPE, CAL_PARTITION_TYPE, CAL_AUTORITY, USE_YND, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_SEQ) VALUES (#{currentCalValue}, #{cdeSeq}, 'E', '100', 'M', 'Y', NOW(), #{cdeSeq});
mapper.select: /* checkRegistrant */ SELECT COUNT(1) AS registrantCnt FROM T_SC_SCH TSS INNER JOIN T_SC_SCH_USER TSSU ON TSS.SCHM_SEQ = TSSU.SCHM_SEQ AND TSS.SCH_SEQ = TSSU.SCH_SEQ AND TSS.CREATE_SEQ = TSSU.CDE_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSS.SCHM_SEQ = #{curSeq} AND TSS.SCH_SEQ = #{curSeq} AND TSSU.SCH_PARTITION_TYPE = '10'
mapper.insert: /* insertSchParticipant */ INSERT INTO T_SC_SCH_USER (SCHM_SEQ, SCH_SEQ, CDE_SEQ, CDE_TYPE, SCH_PARTITION_TYPE, SCH_AUTORITY, CAL_SEQ, USE_YND, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_SEQ) VALUES(#{curSeq}, #{curSeq}, #{cdeSeq}, 'E', '10', 'M', #{calSeq}, 'Y', now(), #{cdeSeq})
